forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 11C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Becoming windy overnight. Low 51F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning will give way to a steadier rain and gusty winds in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning will give way to a steadier rain and gusty winds in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds late. Low 9C. E winds shifting to N at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some evening rain. Low 47F. E winds shifting to N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 49F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 39F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 50F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 39F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.
